Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Relates to labeling requirements of prescription drug containers where such drugs contain gluten, lactose or food dye
Summary: Requires the labeling of prescription drug containers where such drugs contain gluten, lactose or food dye.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to labeling of prescription drugs containing gluten, lactose or food dye
